snippet: The $10 million settlement resolves claims that Ernst helped Lehman engineer an accounting fraud in the months before its 2008 bankruptcy filing.
abstract: Ernst & Young agrees to pay $10 million to settle lawsuit brought by New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman against accounting firm for allegations of accounting fraud that contributed to collapse of Lehman Brothers.
lead_paragraph: The $10 million settlement resolves claims that Ernst helped Lehman engineer an accounting fraud in the months before its 2008 bankruptcy filing.

headline.main: Ernst & Young in Settlement Over Lehman Brothers
headline.print_headline: Ernst & Young in Settlement Over Lehman Brothers
